name: filially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the idea that a son or daughter should show respect to parents, grandparents, and older people: No one doubted that he was filially devoted to his grandmother. It is the norm in their society that children are filially respectful to older members of their family.
More examplesFewer examplesHe became a national hero and a model of the loyal, patriotic, and filially dutiful citizen. He had acted filially by doing what his father had asked, but he had serious doubts.
